column.name: TRANCODE
column.comment: Indicator for a record type for delta tables, N => New, M => Modify, D => Delete

column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: HEADER
column.comment: Header String

column.name: TRAILER
column.comment: Footer String

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. For those from himself or from others to him

column.name: ENT_SEQ_NO
column.comment: N/A

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: The field holds the date the record was updated.

column.name: CREDIT_STATUS
column.comment: The field describes the CAS status, which is a code that represents CAS's application processing state. Possible values: " " - before first BonSys request, "P" - Pending (when the request was sent), "C" - Complete. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: INT_CREDIT_CLASS
column.comment: This field describes the BAN's internal credit class as determined by the system. Valid credit class from the table CREDIT_CLASS or wildcard "*". - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: EXT_CREDIT_CLASS
column.comment: This is the external credit class - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: EXT_CRD_CLASS_DATE
column.comment: The date when the external credit class was changed. This date is updated only by the credit evaluation result. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: RATING_REASON_CODE
column.comment: This is the reason for the external credit class change. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: EXT_CRD_CLS_EFF_DAT
column.comment: The date when the external credit class change is effective. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CREDIT_CLASS_CNG_TP
column.comment: This field contains the credit class change type. Valid values: "D" - automatic downgrade, "U" - automatic upgrade, "M" - manual change. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: RISK_POINTS
column.comment: The number of risk points calculated for the customer. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CREDIT_STATUS_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the credit status was updated. Updated along with the field CREDIT_STATUS. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: MAN_RISK_POINT_IND
column.comment: Indicates that another risk point should be applied to the account. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CRD_EVAL_REQ_BY
column.comment: The user that made the request for credit evaluation. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: ACTIVATION_EVAL
column.comment: The result of the internal credit evaluation performed by the CSM to determine if activation will be allowed and to determine the required deposit. Valid values: "A" - Approve, "R" - Refuse, "D" - Deposit, "B" - Barring, "F" - Follow-up. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: BARRING_SOC
column.comment: The barring SOC that needs to be deployed if the credit evaluation result is barring. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CRD_EVAL_REQ_DATE
column.comment: The date on which the credit evaluation was requested. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: INSURANCE_LIMIT
column.comment: The level of insurance for the BAN (measured in subscribers).

column.name: NL_RISK_LIMIT
column.comment: The additional number of subscribers approved by the NL for this BAN.

column.name: NABU_IND
column.comment: This is used in relation to business customers only. These customers are insured against loss however this cover may be withdrawn. Once we receive notification we clarify them as NABU. The account is then reclarified and the NABU indicator is removed.

column.name: VDB_RISK_LIMIT
column.comment: The additional number of subscribers approved by the VDB for this BAN.

column.name: NUM_OF_REQ_SUBSC
column.comment: This is the number of subscribers specified by the user when submitting the credit evaluation request to BonSys. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: REQUEST_NO
column.comment: Nummer, die die Transaktion/Anfrage identifiziert - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: CCR_REASON_CODE
column.comment: Identifies the change reason for the data. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: OVER_LIMIT
column.comment: Indicates whether the BAN is over the allowed limit of the subscribers. Valid values: "Y" - The BAN is over the allowed limit, "N" - The BAN is not over the allowed limit, "K" - The BAN is still over limit - even after the overlimit evaluation. - CONVERT-

column.name: HANDLED_INDICATOR
column.comment: Indicates if the current record is already handled. - CONVERT-JOB

column.name: DEALER_CODE
column.comment: Dealer code. - Dealer Code of dealer who created group.

column.name: LST_INT_CHK_DATE
column.comment: Last date that the BAN was checked by Credit Class process

column.name: NUM_OF_ST_COLL
column.comment: Number of started collections for the BAN

column.name: NUM_OF_FRST_PHY_ACT_IN_SC
column.comment: Number of physical activities for the BAN

column.name: CHANGE_CC_ENTRY
column.comment: will be maintained (Ingo Mehlhorn)

column.name: CHECK_CC_ENTRY
column.comment: will be maintained (Ingo Mehlhorn)

column.name: KIAS_SCORE
column.comment: BAN's KIAS score

column.name: FMS_SCORE
column.comment: BAN's FMS score

column.name: SCORE_UPD_DATE
column.comment: Last score update date
